title: Property Manager
description: Lead property operations for luxury residential complex. Experience with tenant relations and maintenance coordination required.

title: Leasing Agent
description: Conduct property tours, process applications, and assist with lease renewals. Weekend availability preferred.

title: Concierge
description: Provide exceptional front desk service in upscale residential building. Previous hospitality experience a plus.

title: Security Officer
description: Certified security professional needed for commercial property. Fire watch certification required.

title: Maintenance Assistant
description: Support maintenance team with basic repairs and property upkeep. Tools and training provided.

title: Assistant Property Manager
description: Support property manager with daily operations, tenant communications, and administrative tasks.
